item.title: webRTC技术
item.author: zaliasc
item.description: WebRTC wikipedia: WebRTC (Web Real-Time Communication) is a free and open-source project providing web browsers and mobile applications with real-time communication (RTC) via application programming interfaces (APIs). It allows audio and video communication to work inside web pages by allowing direct peer-to-peer communication, eliminating the need to install plugins or download native apps. 数据包传输 一般使用 UDP 进行传输，数据
